result.eng: You will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ga: feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.orig: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.html: feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libhYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: feicfiḋ siḃ sceaċa a ḃfuil deilgne orṫu má éiríonn liḃ na sceaċa deilgneaċa a ċur díḃ beiḋ an lá liḃYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
